name: Tiny Toyfare
description: Tiny Toyfare is a Tower Defense/FPS hybrid with a focus on strategic calm followed by twitch action. Construct powerful towers, recruit adorable squads and fight off the Dino invasion!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-3630 @ 2.40 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nividia GeForce GTX 670 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-6700 @ 4.00 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nividia GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 3 GB available space
